#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType Country.

== Name ==

Country (complexType)

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--Country (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			Country name in address element.
			A country element must include an unambiguous country ISO 3166 2 letter code.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===
{{{
          <...  
            *code = [SISO3166CountryCodeEnum.html ISO3166CountryCodeEnum.html]*
          >string</...>
}}}
----
